body: @Ovilia 嗯，是的，只是怕修改其他地方出现问题，没时间完成去理解所有代码。修改也没办法全部测试，所以采取的其他方式

The link to `series.itemStyle.emphasis` in [styleEmphasis](https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#series-custom.renderItem.arguments.api.styleEmphasis) is wrong. It's `https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#series-custom.itemStyle.emphasis` now, but should be `https://ecomfe.github.io/echarts-doc/public/en/option.html#series-custom.emphasis.itemStyle`. @100pah
It should work with `treemapZoomToNode`. We will check it out later.
可以，横坐标用 category 不要用 time
setOption 的时候你已经知道图表个数了吧，这时候可以对不同个数设置不同的 radius 和位置
你可以自己维护一个是否点击的状态，然后设置不同的 style，在 ECharts 里，emphasis 就是表示鼠标移动到之后的样式，不能表示点击后的样式
我明白了，我大方向都错了.,我试试看,非常感谢了.

I tried to use it this way. 
Im catching "treemapRootToNode" event and im saving params which get included inside callback so i can get seriesNames, uid and things needed for the 'treemapZoomToNode' ( i was checking your source code and tried to duplicate the options json that gets passed with appropriate settings ).
When my chart gets a node removed i try to chart.dispatchAction({those paramaters i save}).

But there is 0 response at all, like nothing gets triggered?
根据你上面提供的代码，我没能在 Mac Chrome 中复现出来。请问你确定上面的代码是可以复现问题的吗，因为截图看数据是比较多的，请确保你提供的数据能复现问题。
传入数据的时候还是传数字，而不是时间，因为理论上时间点和时间点的叠加是没有意义的，只有时长的叠加才是有意义的。
更新到最新版的 ECharts 有问题吗？
如果传时长的话，是不是没法使用 dataZoom 了？
Maybe option to go out of specified percentage could solve a problem? For example setting start could accept value '-10%' and end '110%'.
What is exact issue

数据可以这样处理，`new Date().getTime()` 作为实际数据，再用 `formatter` 转为日期时间类型，不影响使用 dataZoom

In that case, you need to set `z` of some part to be a different value, so that it will be in a different canvas. And updates will only happen in that canvas.

Do you mean the color is not changed according to the max value? 
This is because in line 69th, `option.series[0].axisLine.lineStyle.color[0][0] = value / 100;` value is divided by 100, which should be changed to your max value.

确认这是一个 bug，因为 #8971 是因为的，所以之后统一到那个下面继续。
Duplicate of #8971.
I mean you should put those often change into a different `z`, so that when you show/hide or change them, the rest will not be re-draw.
